Description: Sunlit 1-bedroom unit ~500 sf in the heart of Beacon Hill. Best Location in the city! Easily walk 1 block to Boston Commons, 1 block to Charles St. 5 minute walk to Orange/Red/Green lines, Downtown crossing, Charles River Esplanade, Tufts Medical, MGH. 1 mile to Fenway, South Boston, Copley, TD Garden, North End! Unit will be leased with a rolling 60-day tenancy at will.
